attributes.action: Close this sodding petitions website as it's turd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are petitioning for the removal of this petitions website as it is a blantant attempt by the goverment to prentend that they actually give a toss what the public thinks.

We also believe that vegetables have feelings and their needless slaughter should be stopped.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
